items.title: Nike to raise US prices as firms face tariffs uncertainty
items.description: The US sportswear giant says its price increases are part of "seasonal planning".

items.title: Fact-checking Trump's Oval Office confrontation with Ramaphosa
items.description: President Trump made a series of claims about the killing of white farmers in South Africa, some of which are demonstrably false.

items.title: UN says 90 lorry loads of aid now in Gaza after three-day delay at crossing
items.description: The aid, including flour and baby food, was picked up three days after Israel eased an 11-week-long blockade.

items.title: White crosses shown by Trump not graves, says man who erected them
items.description: The US president had said the crosses were evidence of attacks on white farmers in South Africa.

items.title: Top Maoist leader killed as India cracks down on rebels
items.description: Twenty-seven rebels are reported to have been killed in a gunfight with security forces in Chhattisgarh.
